tuv.seg: الحَمْدُ للهِ عَلَىٰ نَوَالِهِ، والصَّلاةُ عَلَىٰ نَبِيِّهِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ.
All praises are for Allāh for his many favors, and salutations be upon His Prophet and his family.
In the name of Allāh, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
وَبَعْدُ، فَهَذَا مُخْتَصَرٌ فِي عِلْمِ الأَخْلَاقِ، وَرَتَّبْتُهُ عَلَىٰ أَرْبَعِ مَقَالَاتٍ.
To proceed, this is a short composition on etiquette/manners, which I have divided/arranged/ordered into four monographs.
